sentence: …this self-enforcement argument were to be accepted,       however, Congress could easily address it by replacing the       current law mandating that the Capital area's electors vote       in accordance with the outcome of the popular vote in the       District with a new legislative mandate that the Capital       area's electors vote in other ways.…
